text: Hi Mose, just saw you fixed my `build_tarballs.jl` script.  Do I need to do anything? (And, as always, many thanks for your help!)

elements.text: Hi Mose, just saw you fixed my
script.  Do I need to do anything? (And, as always, many thanks for your help!)

text:
I see it's failing for i686-linux-musl, which is kind of a damned platform. I don't have the time to debug it, I think the easiest option is to skip it
```filter!(p -> !(Sys.islinux(p) && arch(p) == "i686" && libc(p) == "musl", supported_platforms()) ```

elements.text: I see it's failing for i686-linux-musl, which is kind of a damned platform. I don't have the time to debug it, I think the easiest option is to skip it

text: Funny, that actually worked locally.  If you haven;t already done so, I will add the filter and thanks again.
